labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: In 'Overlay', string 'Enable in-game overlay' is showing not correctly in-Russian.
data.expected_result: All shall be fine like as you selected English or any different language.
data.short_description: Invalid character encoding in Russian and strings using system language
data.steps_to_repro: - Select Russian language. - Open 'User settings'. - See on "Enable in-game overlay".
